short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your favorite pages with a shortcut!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The QuickFlick Chrome extension is designed to simplify your browsing experience by allowing you to assign keyboard shortcuts to open specific websites instantly. With just a few clicks, you can configure up to four custom shortcuts that open your most frequently visited websites, making your workflow smoother and more efficient.
